description: monitor for k8s cluster include node and pod

panels.title: Disk usage in cluster by node(vda)

panels.description:
This panel shows node memory usage:

node_memory_MemTotal - node_memory_MemAvailable
panels.title: Overall memory usage in cluster

panels.description:
This panel shows node memory usage:

node_memory_MemTotal - node_memory_MemAvailable
panels.title: Memory usage in cluster by node

panels.description:
This panel shows node memory usage:

container working set
panels.title: Memory usage by namespace in cluster

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total[5m])) by (cluster, namespace, pod, container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"}) by (cluster, namespace, pod, container) > 0.75

panels.description:
This panel shows container memory usage:

container_memory_working_set_bytes / kube_pod_container_resource_limits

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes) by (cluster, namespace, pod, container)/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory"}) by (cluster, namespace, pod, container) > 0.75

panels.title: Mem Utilization Rate > 75%

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{container!=""}[5m])) by (container, pod, namespace) / sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{}[5m])) by (container, pod, namespace) > ( 25 / 100 )

title: K8S cluster monitoring
